Computer Science I-K

Class Robot

public abstract class Robot
extends JFrame
implements ActionListener

   
Constructor Summary
 Robot(String title)
           Initializes a newly created Robot object and displays the frame on the screen with the specified title.    
 
Method Summary
abstract  boolean act(String command)
           This method should make the Robot respond to any new commands received as a parameter. Returns true if this Robot has defined an action for the command received as a parameter.
 boolean moveForward()
          Makes the robot moves forward one space.
 void setResponse(String response)
          Sets the text in the Robot's command text field.
 void turnLeft()
          Makes the robot turn 90 degrees to his left
   

Constructor Detail

Robot

public Robot()
Initializes a newly created Robot object and displays the frame on the screen.
Method Detail

act

public abstract boolean act(String command)
This method should make the Robot respond to any new commands received as a parameter.
 
Parameters:
command - String containing the command received from the Robot's command text field.
Returns:
True if this Robot has defined an action for the command received as a parameter.
 

turnLeft

public void turnLeft()
Makes the robot turn 90 degrees to his left

moveForward

public boolean moveForward()
Makes the robot moves forward one space. Returns true if the robot is able to move otherwise false.
 
Returns:
True if the robot is able to move forward otherwise false

setResponse

public void setResponse(String response)
Sets the text in the Robot's JTextField.
 
Parameters:
message - Text to be placed in the Robot's JTextField
